price: 14. Waxaan ku xoojinnay quluubtooda5 samir (iyo iimaan), markay kaceen6 oo (ku) yidhaahdeen (boqorkii xukumayey ee sanam caabdudka ahaa): Rabbigayo waa (Allaah) Rabbiga samooyinka iyo arlada, weligayo ma baryeyno (caabudeyno) ilaah kale aan Isaga ahayn, (haddaan wax sidaa ka duwan nidhaahno) waxaan xaqiiq markaa ku hadallay wax xun oo xadgudub ah.
arabic: وَرَبَطۡنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ إِذۡ قَامُواْ فَقَالُواْ رَبُّنَا رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَن نَّدۡعُوَاْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَٰهٗاۖ لَّقَدۡ قُلۡنَآ إِذٗا شَطَطًا
footnotes:
5. Waxay dhexdooda iskula ballameen inaysan caabudin axad aan ahayn Allaah, Macbuudka Xaqa ah. 
6. Inta abbaaray boqorkii Dikyanus ee daalim ahaa kibir badan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: warabaṭnā ʿalā qulūbihim idh qāmū faqālū rabbunā rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi lan nadʿuwā min dūnihi ilāhan laqad qul'nā idhan shaṭaṭan
